title: Web Metrics
description: Quantifiable measures used to track and assess the status of a web activity.

xdm:pageViews.title: Page Views
xdm:pageViews.description: Number of views of a web page.

xdm:linkClicks.title: Link Clicks
xdm:linkClicks.description: Number of clicks of a web link.
